user_query: I'm a music producer and I'm looking for new talent to collaborate with. Can you provide me with a list of up-and-coming artists from different genres? Also, suggest some related artists for each genre.

TaskList.description: Research and collect a list of up-and-coming artists across various music genres.
For each identified genre, find related artists who have a similar style or sound.
Compile the results into a comprehensive report that includes both up-and-coming and related artists by genre.
